channel.title: Commands on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in Commands on Today I Learned

item.title: iex useful commands
item.description: Commands Recopmile # recompile all files iex> recompile # recompile specific Module iex> r Foo Renew iex iex> respawn # kill this iex process and wake up new iex process. # to use respawn when doing 'pry' especially. iex> self #PID<0.23831.8> # <- before iex> respawn Interactive Elixir (1.4.2) - press Ctrl+C to exit (type h() ENTER for help) iex> self #PID<0.23927.8> # <- after Alias # alias iex> alias Foo.
